Bullet1.label: Experience Bullets1
Bullet1.value: Solution Architect for the 5 Full stack web development projects by developing UI in ReactJs and REST APIs in Python Flask or Django.

Bullet2.label: Experience Bullets2
Bullet2.value: Performed Frontend and Backend integration for web projects, actively contributing across the Software Development Lifecycle.

Bullet3.label: Experience Bullets3
Bullet3.value: Designed and developed scalable REST and GraphQL APIs on Azure, integrating Azure PostgreSQL and Cosmos DB across distributed systems to support data ingestion, transformation and retrieval workflows.

Bullet4.label: Experience Bullets4
Bullet4.value: Defined database schema for SQL databases (PostgreSQL) and NO-SQL databases (MongoDB) as part of the full stack solution development.

Bullet5.label: Experience Bullets5
Bullet5.value: Developed comprehensive unit tests using Jest and Pytest to ensure code quality and coverage. Led code reviews for junior developers, enforcing best practices and design consistency.

Bullet6.label: Experience Bullets6
Bullet6.value: Designed and maintained modular, reusable CI/CD pipelines using YAML templates in Azure DevOps for automated deployments across environments.

Bullet7.label: Experience Bullets7
Bullet7.value: Configured self-hosted agents in Azure DevOps to automate testing, build Docker images for system components, and deploy containers to VMs.

Bullet8.label: Experience Bullets8
Bullet8.value: Automated the provisioning of AKS clusters using terraform and deployed containerized applications in Kubernetes pods, managing deployments, services, and config maps declaratively for scalable orchestration.
